mapper.select:
select sool.* from stock_out_order_level2 sool left join spare_part_stock_info spsi on sool.custodial_warehouse_code = spsi.warehouse_code and spsi.del_flag = 0
and sool.del_flag = 0
and sool.order_code like concat(concat('%',#{condition.orderCode}),'%')
and spsi.warehouse_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition.warehouseName}),'%')
and Date(sool.out_time) >= #{condition.outTimeBegin} and Date(sool.out_time) <= #{condition.outTimeEnd}
order by sool.create_time desc
